keyMappings:
unmapAll

## local navigation
map h scrollLeft
map j scrollDown
map k scrollUp
map l scrollRight
map gg scrollToTop
map G scrollToBottom
map <c-f> scrollPageDown
map <c-b> scrollPageUp
map zh scrollToLeft
map zl scrollToRight
map zH scrollToLeft
map zL scrollToRight

# focusInput uses <tab> and <s-tab> to navigate input box selection
map gi focusInput
map gf nextFrame
map gF mainFrame

map m Marks.activateCreateMode
map ' Marks.activateGotoMode
map <c-v> passNextKey

## modes
map i enterInsertMode
map v enterVisualMode
map V enterVisualLineMode

map f LinkHints.activateMode
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map <c-F> LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito
map a LinkHints.activateModeToDownloadLink
map y LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl
map zf LinkHints.activateMode action=focus

## find mode
map / enterFindMode
map n performFind
map N performBackwardsFind
map * findSelected
map # findSelectedBackwards

## tab management
map <c-t> createTab
map gT previousTab
map gt nextTab
map g0 firstTab
map g$ lastTab
map <c-T> restoreTab
map <c-w> removeTab

map r reload
map <c-r> reload hard
map <c-m> toggleMuteTab

## external navigation
map gu goUp 
map g/ goToRoot 
map ,cu copyCurrentUrl
map g+ openCopiedUrlInNewTab
#map gb visitPreviousTab
map <a-left> goBack
map <a-right> goForward

#map <c-space> Vomnibar.activate keyword=k
#map <c-space> Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map <c-space> Vomnibar.activate
map <c-e> Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map <c-E> Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab
map <c-g> Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
searchEngines:
define: https://www.google.com/search?q=define:%s Google Dictionary
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
g!: https://www.google.com/search?btnI=1&q=%s Google!
maps: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
scholar: https://scholar.google.com/scholar?%s Google Scholar
yt: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s YouTube search
youtube: https://www.youtube.com/%s YouTube

amazon: https://www.amazon.com/s?field-keywords=%s Amazon Search
wiki: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia Search
w: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/%s Wikipedia

ddg: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
ddg!: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=\%s DuckDuckGo
yt: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
B: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
Q: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
k: https://kagi.com/search?q=%s Kagi
k!: https://kagi.com/search?q=\%s Kagi!

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
